entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 10 except plus 5 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning then west 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 10 except plus 5 along parts of the coast. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the evening and after midnight. Showers beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 6 May 2023
